headline: Lam Research Teams Up With JSR: Can it Lead in High-NA EUV?
summary: LRCX teams up with JSR to advance high-NA EUV, combining dry resist tools and materials to drive next-generation chip scaling.

headline: Should You be Excited about the Prospects for Lam Research Corporation (LRCX)?
summary: Columbia Threadneedle Investments, an investment management company, released its “Columbia Seligman Global Technology Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The US equities strongly rebounded in the second quarter following a turbulent first quarter. The fund’s Institutional Class shares returned 19.52% in the quarter, compared to a 23.18% […]

headline: AI trade has 'more room to run': Investment plays beyond Nvidia
summary: Alibaba (BABA) stock is surging after the company announced plans to expand its global artificial intelligence (AI) buildout. Crossmark Global Investments chief market strategist Victoria Fernandez and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss how to play the AI trade. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
